Reviews.Title: Good entry-level digital camera
Reviews.Author: dukedog0102
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for someone traveling overseas. Taken almost 3,000 photos so far, seems to be working great.Pros:Lightweight, easy to useExcellent lithium rechargeable batteryCons:Sometimes not the sharpest photosDoes not include SD cardIf you're looking for professional-quality photography, this is probably not the camera for you.  Go buy a DSLR.However, if you need a cheap, easy digital camera with a great rechargeable battery, at this low-end price level, you can't beat it.  Most of the cameras in this price range do not have rechargeable lithium batteries.  Good first digital camera for those interesting in getting started.

Reviews.Title: Need a refund..getting the run around
Reviews.Author: sthiede
Reviews.Content: After only 1 week it broke and we could not get it to turn on or off..it was just stuck and buzzing. I tried to get a refund from audio video communication and they wanted me to contact the manufacture. I just want my money back so I can buy another brand.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: SMW42
Reviews.Content: Most of the shots taken were blurry.  Ended up returning the camera for a refund.  Purchased Kodak Easy-Share C183 for $10 cheaper and pictures were better.

Reviews.Title: Great for my eight year old
Reviews.Author: A. Walker
Reviews.Content: This coupled with an "Oops" warranty made the perfect gift for my eight year old. Great pictures and the perfect size for her backpack.

Reviews.Title: A Gift
Reviews.Author: Gaylon
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 22 year old daughter she really likes it because it has a battery like a cell phone you just plugin to the wall, she was all low on battery.

Reviews.Title: Olympus T-100 12MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.4 inch LCD review
Reviews.Author: David Ren
Reviews.Content: It sucks. That pretty much sums up how I feel about this camera. Honestly it was horrible, the quality of the pictures were horrible, the camera functions are bad too. Say for example you want to quickly switch from pictures to video capture mode, it takes too long to switch cause instead of having a switch like other cameras, on this one you have to scroll options to get to it. It was so bad I had to return and get a sony cybershot, which works wonders. I went to Japan this summer and if I had used this camera I would've missed so many opportunities for videos. Just go for something kinda expensive and good, that what I say, don't get this thing.

Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy this Crap
Reviews.Author: Mav2564
Reviews.Content: I cannot believe that you would sell this product without even a 250mb memory card.  How cheap could you possibly be. Way to take advantage of people.

ProductInfo.Features:
12 Megapixels
SD Compatible

Lithium-Ion Battery
ProductInfo.Name: Olympus T-100 12MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.4 inch LCD (Red)
